pageContext.claim: “In recent days, San Francisco officials denied ICE’s request to turn over a criminal alien with a prior conviction for battery and a charge for driving under the influence.”
pageContext.analysis: On March 10, Trump devoted his weekly address to sanctuary cities and illegal immigration. But it's not clear that ICE was looking for this individual at the time he was convicted of battery; instead, the agency issued a detainer when he was arrested for DUI. It bears mentioning that crime has been declining in San Francisco. ICE ultimately arrested this person anyway.
